Game.Name: Backyard Football (USA)
Game.plot: Backyard Football teams up with the NFL to bring kid versions of the best tackling, passing, and running pros. You can choose from all 32 NFL teams or create your own with custom team names and uniforms. Once your team is ready, you'll pick a playing field, call the plays, and direct all the action in single games or an entire season. The game also features 30 backyard kids, a stat tracker in season play, and multiple camera angles.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/578867.htmlCheat: Unlock Pablo Sanchez and the dirt fieldBeat the game on any difficulty
Game.Notes: It's great football action with the Backyard Kids and real pro players as kids. Little football fans will enjoy choosing from all 32 NFL teams or create their own with custom team names and uniforms. Call the plays and direct all the action in single games or an entire season's worth of hard-hitting action. It's the chance of a lifetime to play with the pros right in your own backyard!
